home.subtitle: Full-stack developer creating modern applications and digital solutions that make everyday life easier.

about.title: About Me
text-1: I'm a passionate developer with a keen eye for design. I combine technical expertise with creative thinking to build digital solutions that make an impact.
I'm enthusiastic about web development and constantly learning new technologies. I'm committed to writing clean code and creating exceptional user experiences.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or sharing knowledge with the community.
text-2: User-Focused: Every decision is made with the end user in mind, ensuring intuitive and enjoyable interactions.
Quality First: I believe in writing maintainable, scalable code that stands the test of time.
Continuous Learning: Technology evolves rapidly, and I stay updated with the latest trends and best practices.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a a project in mind? Let's talk about it!
contact.modalMessage: Dziękuję za wiadomość. Odpowiem tak szybko, jak to możliwe.
